name: controle-financeiro-pessoal
description: Aplicativo web para controle financeiro pessoal com assistente AI.

scripts.start: echo "No start script configured, serve index.html with a static server." && exit 1
scripts.build: echo "Cleaning previous build..." && rm -rf dist && echo "Compiling TypeScript..." && npx tsc && echo "Copying static assets..." && cp index.html metadata.json index.css dist/ && echo "Frontend files built into dist. API folder remains at root for Vercel Serverless Functions."
